channel.title: BEST OF Pregame.com - Sports Betting Podcasts
channel.description: Football, basketball, and baseball experts from Las Vegas. The biggest sports stories discussed; the biggest games previewed. FREE PICKS too! Real professional bettors informing entertaining - helping NFL, college, and MLB bettors get ready. Listen to Pregame.com Podcasts.
channel.itunes:author: Pregame.com
channel.itunes:summary: The BEST OF Pregame.com Sports Betting Podcasts helps sports bettors win with a weekly free picks show, how-to-handicap tutorials, and episodes featuring famous expert handicappers. Taped in Las Vegas, subjects include big game previews, odds, line moves, handicapping tips, sportsbook advice, and insider Las Vegas gambling stories. Vegas Runner, Marco D’Angelo, and RJ Bell plus the most impressive collection of sports betting experts found anywhere discuss NFL, college football, NBA, college basketball, MLB baseball, and more exciting action.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The BEST OF Pregame.com sports betting podcasts – including a weekly free picks show, how-to-handicap tutorials, and episodes featuring famous expert handicappers. Subjects include big game previews, winning odds, handicapping tips, and Las Vegas storie

item.title: NASCAR Betting Weekly: Michigan Helluva Good Sour Cream Dips 400

item.title: NASCAR Betting Weekly: Pocono 5-Hour Energy 500
item.description: Pregame.com Forum veteran SIG is back with his weekly tips for the upcoming race from Pocono, PA. SIG has all your weekly information to get you ready to bet the upcoming race. SIG has an inside tip to compete with Denny Hamlin check it out!

item.title: TiSB: A Real Wiseguy Talks NCAA Tournament Betting
item.description: The “Philly Godfather”, an active professional bettor (and friends with VR), talks about how his office bets TRIPLE per game during March Madness while only betting dogs on the money line! He gives host RJ Bell his long shot Final Four team and his round one best bet on Wednesday’s Today in Sports Betting Show (March 16, 2011).
item.itunes:subtitle: The "Philly Godfather" explains why he bets TRIPLE during March Madness, and only money line dogs! Plus, his 1st round best bet.

item.title: Game Previews: Round 1 NCAA Tournament
item.description: Get 3 free picks from Marco D'Angelo, including his podcast best bet of the week and biggest future wagers. item.title: RJ Bell On ESPN LA Talking Lebron James
item.description: The Mason & Ireland show, the afternoon drive show on ESPN 710 in LA, had on Pregame.com CEO RJ Bell to discuss the latest Lebron James free agent odds. (July 7, 2010)
item.itunes:subtitle: The Mason & Ireland show had on Pregame.com CEO RJ Bell to discuss the latest Lebron James free agent odds.

item.title: RJ Bell on Fox Sports National Radio
item.description: Talking Lebron James odds on the Tony Bruno show (with guest host Ben Maller) on Fox Sports National Radio.
item.itunes:subtitle: Talking Lebron James odds on the Tony Bruno show (with guest host Ben Maller) on Fox Sports National Radio

item.title: Weekly Sports Preview: NBA Finals Pick, Big-12 Realignment, Tom Izzo and More
item.description: The NBA Finals game 7 is profiled in two-segment detail, with Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo.  Generally regarded as the single most electric NBA Finals showdown in years, this is a game 7 winner-take-all grudge match between the Lakers and Celtics.  Marco and VR profile the changing landscape of NCAA Conferences (Big-12, Pac-10, Big-10), and continue the talk of Lebron James and Tom Izzo, as well, on this week's This Week in Sports Betting. (June 16, 2010)
item.itunes:subtitle: The NBA Finals game 7 is profiled in two-segment detail, with Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: BABIP and Brazilian Babes
item.description:
Basewinner joins Host Gill Alexander for Sabermetrics Wednesday, as the two get geeky with a review of the metric Batting Average on Balls In Play and the gambling concept of Recent-ism, and then get freaky with a tribute to the international babes of the World Cup and the Forum Member posters who share their pics on Wednesday's Betting Dork (June 16, 2010) 

.
item.itunes:subtitle: Concepts of Recent-ism and BABIP are discussed, including Basewinner's 4 Free MLB Plays.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Sports Betting Tips & Statistics Overload
item.description: It's all packed into 33 minutes.  Host Gill Alexander drives home his single biggest World Cup betting tip, reiterates Marco's 2 huge betting points when approaching the rest of the NBA Finals, and serves up a bevy of MLB stats, including the Top Over/Under Umps, Top Run Supported Starters, and Best/Worst Run Line Teams.
item.itunes:subtitle: Gills single biggest World Cup betting tip, plus Marco's 2 huge betting points when approaching the rest of the NBA Finals

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Marco's Monday Debut
item.description: GM of Picks Marco D'Angelo takes his rightful spot w Host Gill Alexander on Mondays to discuss the NBA Finals and the MLB ballgame that sticks out for him on today's board.  Plus, Gill and Marco tease their pending debate about Notre Dame.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Vegas Runner Freestylin'
item.description: VR joins Host Gill Alexander for their Friday free flow, touching on MLB Interleague play, diving full bore into the World Cup w off-the-radar teams to watch (plus free play), and uncovering the single key stat in the NBA Finals and how NBA GMs outthink themselves.  Plus, fresh off his call on Denny Hamlin winning the Pocono 500 last Sunday, VR tips us off on who the driver to back is this weekend in NASCAR.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: World Cup Betting Primer
item.description: It's the single biggest sports betting event in the world with over $1.5 billion set to be wagered.  And that's just the money we know about.  It makes the Super Bowl and NCAA tournament look like things on which you make a gentlemen's bet.  It's the 2010 World Cup and Host Gill Alexander has the two most important single factors the wiseguys consider when betting it.  Within that context, he reveals the teams to pay attention to.

item.title: Weekly Sports Preview: NBA Finals, Rookie Pitchers & Unit vs Flat Betting Continued
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo preview the week in sports, including the NBA Finals Game 4 Showdown between the Lakers and Celtics, continue the discussion on Unit-vs.-Flat Betting Styles, and offer a "How To" on handicapping Rookie Pitchers in the Bigs. (June 9, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: World Cup Sabermetrics
item.description: Forum Member Basewinner joins Host Gill Alexander for their typical Wednesday Sabermetrics discussion, but this time, it's with a twist, highlighting sabermetrics-driven World Cup plays.  Plus, MLB plays, Stephen Strasburg, and how the NBA can teach MLB a lesson.
item.itunes:subtitle: World Cup Sabermetrics with Gill!

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: MLB Totals & Run Line Stats Bonanza
item.description: Host Gill Alexander flies solo w his long overdue MLB Stats Bonanza catering specifically to Totals and Run Line Bettors.  Top Over/Under Umpires, Top Run Supported Starters/per 9IP, Best/Worst Run Line Teams w biggest ML/RL discrepancy teams revealed, as well.  Plus, because he can't resist being a Super Dork, Gill extrapolates on how BABIP has to be applied differently to different types of pitchers.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Fox Football Fone-In's Temryss Lane - World Cup
item.description: Fox Football Fone-In Personality and Futbolita Temryss Lane joins Host Gill Alexander to give an in-depth breakdown of the USA national team, the roots of Lionel Messi's motivation as a world class player, and which teams have a legit shot at winning the World Cup.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Vegas Runner Friday Free-for-All
item.description: Vegas Runner and Host Gill Alexander have their regular Friday off-the-cuff conversation, replete w NBA Finals talk, Friday's MLB Board, VR's NHL thoughts, Boxing talk on Cotto-Foreman, the Belmont Stakes, and NASCAR. That's right, the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series at Pocono w free pick.  Plus in-game betting and more.
item.itunes:subtitle: Vegas Runner & Gill Alexander talk MLB, NHL, Boxing, the Belmont Stakes, NASCAR. w/ NASCAR Sprint Cup free pick & more.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Belmont Stakes Preview 2010
item.description: GM of Picks and Horse Racing Expert Marco D'Angelo stops by to chat w Host Gill Alexander as he does before each Triple Crown race.  After his spot-on analysis before the Derby and Preakness, Marco comes on strong w a horse-by-horse breakdown of the Belmont and all that you need to know when betting the race.  Plus, Marco's take on public perception headed into the NBA Finals.
item.itunes:subtitle: Marco D'Angelo stops by to chat with Gill Alexander.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Inside the Sabermetrics Lab w Basewinner
item.description: Forum Guest Basewinner joins Host Gill Alexander for their Sabermetrics-driven Wednesday back-and-forth, and some non-stat-based moments like texting MLB scores while at Sex & The City 2 and conceiving one potential show on a hypothetical gambling network.  And, of course, Basewinner's 4 plays of the day.

item.title: Weekly Sports Preview: NBA Finals & Unit vs Flat Betting
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo preview the week in sports, including the upcoming NBA Finals showdown between the Lakers and Celtics, and break down the advantages and disadvantages of both Unit Betting and Flat Betting. (June 1, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Yahoo! Sports Marc Spears - NBA Part 4
item.description: Yahoo Sports! NBA Writer Marc Spears returns to discuss the Boston/Los Angeles Championship Series, including his thoughts on Host Gill Alexander questioning the circumstances surrounding the Celtics and Lakers acquiring Kevin Garnett and Pau Gasol, respectively, 3 seasons ago, whether or not he believes the Lakers have an answer for Rajon Rondo, and the easiest and toughest players to deal with as a reporter covering these two teams.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Vegas Runner Holiday Weekend Smorgasbord
item.description: It's your Memorial Day Weekend Betting Primer as Vegas Runner and Host Gill Alexander bounce from the NBA Playoffs to MLB to even the NHL.  From Gill amusing himself by reading excerpts from Tim Donaghy's Facebook page to VR's solid conviction on the outcomes of UFC action and everything in between, it's all here.

item.title: Weekly Sports Preview: NBA Conf Finals, Lebron and Tim Donaghy
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo preview the week in sports, including the current NBA Playoff Conference Finals match-ups, Lebron James' Free Agency Odds, and Tim Donaghy's lasting impact on the NBA Playoffs! (May 27, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Formally Welcoming the Dork
item.description: GM of Picks Marco D'Angelo formally welcomes Host Gill Alexander as a Pregame Pro, if by "formally" you mean by busting his chops.  Marco also gives his in-depth takes on both NBA series and his MLB Trap Game of the Day.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: The Dream Sabermetrics
item.description: Forum Guest Basewinner joins Host Gill Alexander to discuss the sabermetrics they’d ideally like to see developed in the future.  Plus, Basewinner’s 4 MLB Plays of the Day.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: Sabermetrics Past, Present, and Future
item.description: Host Gill Alexander condenses a decade's worth of Sabermetrics evolution in MLB Front offices into one show and gives an indication of where it's headed next.  Plus, brief handicapping thoughts on each of the 15 ballgames in baseball today.

item.title: Betting Dork Gill Alexander: MLB Totals/Run Lines Stats Bonanza
item.description: Host Gill Alexander is joined by Forum Member STL-Sharp to discuss key MLB Betting Stats: Top Over/Under Umpires, Most/Least Run-Supported Starters, Best/Worst Run Line Teams (teams w biggest ML/RL discrepancy).  Plus, STL-Sharp's MLB Lean of the Moment.

item.title: Betting Dork: Interleague Baseball Handicapping w/ VR
item.description: Friday's Free-flowing conversation w Vegas Runner!  Interleague Baseball Stats & Angles, Perspective on Bullpens, in search of Pete Rose Face footage, VR sprinting to the mound to save a bet, NBA, Cappers' willingness to subjugate ego, The Gill/VR Book Club (May 21, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: MMA Betting Theory
item.description: Pregame Forum Guest Unassail (Aaron) joins Host Gill Alexander to discuss MMA Betting Theory and Picks for this weekend, as Gill plays Old School and challenges Aaron on   aspects of MMA in the process.  Plus, Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and his peculiar affinity for A1 Steak Sauce. (May 20, 20010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Lebron James Should Play For What Team?
item.description: Forum guest Basewinner joins host Gill Alexander for Sabermetrcis Wednesday.  Basewinner goes in-depth on his 3 plays of the day and what metrics drove him there.  Plus, Gill outlines his case for a team that never gets mentioned in the LeBron sweepstakes but ought to be given serious consideration by King James himself. (March 19, 2010)

item.title: NBA Conference Finals Breakdown & Lebron/Mrs. James/Delonte Saga
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo preview the week in sports, including the current NBA Playoff Conference Finals match-ups and what to make of Delonte West and Lebron James' mom! (May 18, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: How Does Sac Lawson Handicap?
item.description: Host Gill Alexander and Pro Sac Lawson delve into their MLB Handicapping approaches and the validity of stats like Day/Night Splits, Run Support, and other often cited trends.  Plus, a look into today's MLB slate of games and NBA tilt.

item.title: Betting Dork: Yahoo's Marc Spears - NBA Part 3
item.description:
Marc Spears of Yahoo Sports! comes back to discuss LeBron

and the NBA Conference Finals, plus MLB StatFest...Top Over/Under Umpires, Top Run-Supported Starters, Best/Worst Run Line Teams.

item.title: Betting Dork: NBA Conference Finals Preview
item.description: Vegas Runner guests, running through NBA line interpretations from Cavs/Celts Game 6 to both opening games of the NBA Conference Finals.  Plus, VR's Friday MLB games of note, his NHL Flyers/Bruins Game 7 lean, and the latest Preakness buzz on today's Betting Dork hosted by Gill Alexander (May 14, 2010).

item.title: NBA Conference Finals Preview & Series Handicapping Toolbelt
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo preview the week in sports, including the upcoming NBA Playoff Conference Finals match-ups and how to handicap an entire NBA Playoff Series from start to finish! (May 13, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Preakness 2010 Preview
item.description: Preakness Preview 2010, including odds, contenders, and handicapping picks and horse racing betting tips - with Marco D'Angelo with host Gill Alexander on this Betting Dork podcast (May 13, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Sabermetrics with Basewinner
item.description: Best and worst UZR (Ultimate Zone Rating) teams in baseball and where you can find the edge on today's MLB betting board discussed by host Gill Alexander and forum star Basewinner on today's Betting Dork podcast (May 12, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Weekly MLB Stats Bonanza
item.description: Top Over/Under Umpires, Best/Worst Run Line Teams, Top Run Supported Pitchers, Noteworthy BABIP starters in action with host Gil Alexander on today's Betting Dork podcast (May 11, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: NFL Future Picks 2010
item.description: Post-Draft and Free Ageny period NFL Futures picks discussed by Mike Hook and host Gill Alexander. Yes, it's May, but it's never too early for football. Plus, the two top BCS Championship Futures picks on Monday's Betting Dork podcast (May 10, 2010).

item.title: Betting Dork: MLB Line Movement with Vegas Runner
item.description: Friday and Saturday MLB Baseball and NBA games are discussed by Vegas Runner and host Gill Alexander, including line move tidbits from the line move expert himself! In addition, zigzag theory, a huge value on a current Series line and free UFC picks are covered on today's Betting Dork podcast (May 7, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Forum Contributor Shout Out!
item.description: Outstounding contributors to his daily MLB thead are thanked on-air by Gill Alexander. In tribute, it's the mobile version of today's MLB thread for those who aren't computer-bound on Thursday's Betting Dork podcast (May 6, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: 1st Time in 6 Years of MLB Baseball?
item.description: Wednesday's Sabermetrics handicapping is discussed with forum guest Basewinner and host Gill Alexander. Plus, some glaring ERA-FIP numbers on today's MLB board, and some afternoon and evening free picks on today's Betting Dork podcast. (May 5, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: 2010 MLB Baseball Stats Update
item.description: MLB Totals and Run Line bettors and the role of Umpires with over and under betting is discussed on today's Betting Dork podcast. Plus top Run Supported Starters (some of whom are on the mound tonight), and Best / Worst Run Line Teams in 2010. (May 4, 2010)  XYZ

item.title: Betting Dork: Yahoo's Marc Spears Talks NBA Playoffs
item.description: NBA expert Marc Spears of Yahoo! Sports is welcomed back to the Betting Dork podcast, covering all things NBA, including Marc's free picks to move forward in the 2010 Playoffs and the one NBA Conspiracy Theory that he's willing to believe.

item.title: Betting Dork: How Vegas Runner Started Out
item.description: Vegas Runner IN-DEPTH!!  Gill Alexander gets VR to talk about his beginnings in the business and his gambling process on today's Betting Dork podcast. Then it's four sports deep with NBA thoughts, MLB tips, VR's Kentucky Derby routine and horse-of-the-moment, and Mayweather vs. Mosley free boxing pick.  If you're betting this weekend, you gotta listen. (April 30, 2010)

item.title: Free 2010 NBA Playoff Picks & Big Event Primer
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo recap the week in sports, including breaking down How the Kentucky Derby is like the Superbowl and offering Free Picks and advice on the 2010 NBA Playoffs!  (April 29, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: Kentucky Derby 2010
item.description: The Kentucky Derby, 2010 edition, previewed by Marco D’Angelo with host Gill Alexander. Horses, Odds, Contenders, plus expert handicapping and horse racing betting factors discussed. (April 29, 2010)

item.title: Betting Dork: MLB Baseball Sabermetrics
item.description: Your Betting Dork, Gill Alexander, welcomes forum member Basewinner to discuss Fielding Independent Pitching (FIP/xFIP), Ultimate Zone Rating (UZR) and specifically, Base Runs (BsR) to give us a sense of where to find value in today's MLB betting lines.

item.title: Free 2010 NBA Playoff Picks & Bonus Track
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo recap the week in sports, including offering Free Picks and advice on the Biggest Playoff games of the weekend!  (April 20, 2010)

item.title: Free Picks & NBA Playoff Preview
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo recap the week in sports, including the upcoming NBA Playoffs, then discuss the Biggest Marquee Playoff Games.  Upcoming big games between the Spurs and Nuggets in the NBA and Yankees and Rays in MLB are broken down. (April 15, 2010)

item.title: Free NBA Picks & Early MLB Baseball Tips
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo recap the week in sports, including the NCAA Championship Game, then discuss Baseball Handicapping Tips and Free Baseball Future Picks.  Upcoming big games between the Spurs and Nuggets in the NBA and Yankees and Rays in MLB are broken down. (April 7, 2010)

item.title: NCAA Final Four 2010: Picks & Predictions
item.description: Direct from Las Vegas, gambling experts Vegas Runner and Marco D'Angelo discuss the NCAA Tournament, including an NCAA Final Four 2010 Overview, Bracket Predictions, and Free Picks on the world-class showdowns between Michigan State and Butler, and between Duke and West Virginia.
